Dear Hagop,

 

We have had a discussion with GIG  with regards to the CGL  2023-2024 policies per entity which were not issued pending the  KYC compliance requirements 

They have now reverted back asking if only 1 policy can be issued instead of per entity for last year’s period under the name of Chalhoub 

 

Await your revert on the same in order to proceed accordingly.

 

Thanking you and Best Regards

 

Savio Salvador D’Costa ACII FIII

Head – Non Marine

 



 

Nasco Middle East
P.O. Box 62528, Dubai, UAE
T +971 4 351 4292  F +971 4 351 4291  D +971 4 305 1697

Yes. Let we can do that.

 

However, appreciate if we can add the last year’s premium to the renewal premium and issue for Chalhoub UAE entities under Allied Enterprises LLC.

 

I will internally allocate afterwards the premium.

 

Best Regards,

Hagop

ID: C7UVSTK_02
From: Savio Salvador D'costa <Savio.Dcosta@nascodubai.com>
To: Hagop Ghazarian <Hagop.Ghazarian@chalhoub.com>
CC: Diana Haydar <Diana.Haydar@nascodubai.com>; Jagdish Laxman Nettimi <Jagdish.Laxman@nascodubai.com>; Shruthi Kunder <Shruthi.Kunder@nascodubai.com>
BCC: 
Date: 2024-12-18 10:26
Subject: RE: KYC - 2023-2024
--------------------------------------------------
CAUTION: This email originated from outside of the organization. Do not click links or open attachments unless you recognize the sender and know the content is safe. 
تم إرسال هذا البريد الإلكتروني من خارج مجموعة شلهوب. لا تنقر على الروابط أو تفتح المرفقات إلا إذا كنت تعرف المرسل وتعلم أنه آمن


Dear Hagop,

 

Trust this mail finds you well.

 

The GIG team of has inquired to please advise them on the pending KYC documents & also the updated  renewal details for 2024-2025 for the CGL as the policy has been advised to be renewed on expiring details.

 

GIG has also informed that they  will book 2 policies as below which please confirm from your end is fine so in which case the KYC will be required for the 2 entities.

The GIG team of has inquired to please advise them on the pending KYC documents & also the updated  renewal details for 2024-2025 for the CGL as the policy has been advised to be renewed on expiring details.

 

GIG has also informed that they  will book 2 policies as below which please confirm from your end is fine so in which case the KYC will be required for the 2 entities. 

 

1.	ALLIED ENTERPRISES LLC (Including entities MUSCAT LUXURY INTERNATIONAL LLC, ELIZABETH ARDEN MIDDLE EAST FZCO, LOCCITANE MIDDLE EAST FZCO, LOCCITANE EMIRATES, CLAD TRADING LLC + FZCO, PUIG EMIRATES LLC)
2.	HAVAS WORLDWIDE MIDDLE EAST FZ-LLC

 

Kindly note that as per AML Regulation the below list is required. 

 KYC form to be filled, signed, stamped and dated. 

	*	Valid Emirates ID of authorized signatories 
	*	Valid ID of Directors. If no directors are available, please mention “Not Available” in the KYC form 
	*	Shareholders who owns 20% shares and above, please provide: 

		*	Level 1: 

			*	For entity, please provide valid TL Copy or certificate of corporation of the entity along with the UBO details 
			*	for Individual then Valid IDs

		*	Level 2 & 3: if the shareholder owns more than 20% :

			*	For entity, please provide full name, country of registration, share count.
			*	For Individual full name and nationality

*	For entity, please provide valid TL Copy or certificate of corporation of the entity along with the UBO details 
			*	for Individual then Valid IDs

		*	Level 2 & 3: if the shareholder owns more than 20% :

			*	For entity, please provide full name, country of registration, share count.
			*	For Individual full name and nationality

		*	Moreover, if there is no individual /entity owning more than 20% the same should be declared at any level in the KYC form 
		*	In the case of listed company, please provide the website link of stock exchange market where shares are clearly listed and if any entity or Individual owns more than 20% of shares. 

*	List of additional documents required: If entity cannot share Partnership Deed / Trust Deed, MOA, financial statement due to confidentiality, please provide the same in "List of documents attached" section in the KYC (page 3) along with the reason for not providing 
*	Memorandum of Association (MOA)  and Articles of Association (AOA).
*	Latest Financial Statement 
*	Partnership Deed / Trust Deed
*	Valid Trade License of our insured
*	VAT Registration Certificate (If applicable)

 

 

 

 

 

 

Thanking you and Best Regards

 

Savio Salvador D’Costa ACII FIII

Head – Non Marine

 



 

Nasco Middle East
P.O. Box 62528, Dubai, UAE
T +971 4 351 4292  F +971 4 351 4291  D +971 4 305 1697

*	List of additional documents required: If entity cannot share Partnership Deed / Trust Deed, MOA, financial statement due to confidentiality, please provide the same in "List of documents attached" section in the KYC (page 3) along with the reason for not providing 
*	Memorandum of Association (MOA)  and Articles of Association (AOA).
*	Latest Financial Statement 
*	Partnership Deed / Trust Deed
*	Valid Trade License of our insured
*	VAT Registration Certificate (If applicable)

 

 

 

 

 

 

Thanking you and Best Regards

 

Savio Salvador D’Costa ACII FIII

Head – Non Marine

 



 

Nasco Middle East

Subject: RE: KYC - 2023-2024 

 

Dear Hagop,

 

Trust this mail finds you well.

 

The GIG team of has inquired to please advise them on the pending KYC documents & also the updated  renewal details for 2024-2025 for the CGL as the policy has been advised to be renewed on expiring details.

 

GIG has also informed that they  will book 2 policies as below which please confirm from your end is fine so in which case the KYC will be required for the 2 entities. 

 

1.	ALLIED ENTERPRISES LLC (Including entities MUSCAT LUXURY INTERNATIONAL LLC, ELIZABETH ARDEN MIDDLE EAST FZCO, LOCCITANE MIDDLE EAST FZCO, LOCCITANE EMIRATES, CLAD TRADING LLC + FZCO, PUIG EMIRATES LLC)
2.	HAVAS WORLDWIDE MIDDLE EAST FZ-LLC

 

Kindly note that as per AML Regulation the below list is required. 

 KYC form to be filled, signed, stamped and dated. 

	*	Valid Emirates ID of authorized signatories 
	*	Valid ID of Directors. If no directors are available, please mention “Not Available” in the KYC form 
	*	Shareholders who owns 20% shares and above, please provide: 

		*	Level 1: 

			*	For entity, please provide valid TL Copy or certificate of corporation of the entity along with the UBO details 
			*	for Individual then Valid IDs

		*	Level 2 & 3: if the shareholder owns more than 20% :

*	For entity, please provide valid TL Copy or certificate of corporation of the entity along with the UBO details 
			*	for Individual then Valid IDs

		*	Level 2 & 3: if the shareholder owns more than 20% :

			*	For entity, please provide full name, country of registration, share count.
			*	For Individual full name and nationality

		*	Moreover, if there is no individual /entity owning more than 20% the same should be declared at any level in the KYC form 
		*	In the case of listed company, please provide the website link of stock exchange market where shares are clearly listed and if any entity or Individual owns more than 20% of shares. 

*	List of additional documents required: If entity cannot share Partnership Deed / Trust Deed, MOA, financial statement due to confidentiality, please provide the same in "List of documents attached" section in the KYC (page 3) along with the reason for not providing 
*	Memorandum of Association (MOA)  and Articles of Association (AOA).
*	Latest Financial Statement 
*	Partnership Deed / Trust Deed
*	Valid Trade License of our insured
*	VAT Registration Certificate (If applicable)

 

 

 

 

 

 

Thanking you and Best Regards

 

Savio Salvador D’Costa ACII FIII

	*	Shareholders who owns 20% shares and above, please provide: 

		*	Level 1:

*	Valid Emirates ID of authorized signatories 
	*	Valid ID of Directors. If no directors are available, please mention “Not Available” in the KYC form 
	*	Shareholders who owns 20% shares and above, please provide: 

		*	Level 1: 

			*	For entity, please provide valid TL Copy or certificate of corporation of the entity along with the UBO details 
			*	for Individual then Valid IDs

		*	Level 2 & 3: if the shareholder owns more than 20% :

			*	For entity, please provide full name, country of registration, share count.
			*	For Individual full name and nationality

		*	Moreover, if there is no individual /entity owning more than 20% the same should be declared at any level in the KYC form 
		*	In the case of listed company, please provide the website link of stock exchange market where shares are clearly listed and if any entity or Individual owns more than 20% of shares. 

*	List of additional documents required: If entity cannot share Partnership Deed / Trust Deed, MOA, financial statement due to confidentiality, please provide the same in "List of documents attached" section in the KYC (page 3) along with the reason for not providing 
*	Memorandum of Association (MOA)  and Articles of Association (AOA).
*	Latest Financial Statement 
*	Partnership Deed / Trust Deed
*	Valid Trade License of our insured
*	VAT Registration Certificate (If applicable)
